name: BooksToScrape Basic
description: A fundamental spider that scrapes book titles, prices, and URLs from all pages of books.toscrape.com. Uses basic CSS selectors and handles pagination.
author: Scrapy Docs / Modified
notes: Good starting point for simple catalog sites.

name: QuotesToScrape JS (Playwright)
description: Scrapes quotes from the JavaScript-rendered version of quotes.toscrape.com. Requires Playwright integration to handle dynamic content loading.
author: Scrapy-Playwright Docs / Modified
notes: Requires Playwright setup (run 'playwright install'). Project settings need DOWNLOAD_HANDLERS and TWISTED_REACTOR configured for Playwright.

name: QuotesToScrape Infinite Scroll (Playwright)
description: Scrapes quotes from the infinite scrolling page on quotes.toscrape.com. Uses Playwright's async capabilities to trigger scrolling actions.
author: Example Hub Contributor
notes: Demonstrates async page interaction. Requires Playwright setup.

name: Httpbin API Example
description: A simple spider that makes a request to httpbin.org/get and yields the JSON response. Good template for basic API scraping.
author: Example Hub Contributor
notes: Change start_urls and parsing logic for your target API.
